import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { slugify } from '../../utils'; const PostTwo = ( { data, classes, bgWhite } ) => { return (
{data.categories.slice(0, 1)}

{data.title}

  • { data.date }
  • Posted By {data.author}
) } export default PostTwo;
